general.description: The Jones Corporation uses this planetoid as its base of operations. This planetoid and its adjacent space rocks are particularly abundant in exotic elements. Jones Corp. makes heavy use of these in the manufacture of ships used on more dangerous (and profitable) trade routes. Though this planetoid is more heavily armed the balance between the Heiwa traders has been balanced in other ways.
general.bar: This is a dimly lit bar, with a strange mix of large drinks and fiddly little cocktails. The clientele seems similarly mismatched and everytime you might overhear a conversion dark looks are thrown. It'd probably be best to quickly finish up business and your drink with a minimum of fuss.
